name: 3/4" NPT Industrial Air Dryer for Compressor,3 Stage Air Compressor Water Separator System,Filter Oil Water Separator Dryer for Plasma Cutter and Paint Spray,Auto Drain
short_description: 【Industrial Performance】The air drying system features two rugged 3/4“ NPT air ports and 1/4” NPT gauge ports to handle high-pressure environments (up to 240 PSI) for a variety of industrial applications. Note: To prevent air leakage, please wrap the sealing tape around the threads appropriately before connecting the screws.

【Ultra Filtration】The compressed air dryer utilizes a three-stage filtration system to remove contaminants. The first stage (5 micron filter) removes 95% of particles and moisture. The second stage (0.01 micron agglomerated filter) handles 99.98% of the remaining moisture and contaminants. Finally, the desiccant air dryer ensures exceptionally clean and dry air

【Easy Maintenance】User-friendly maintenance. The second stage filter features a visual window that pops up with a green indicator light when it needs to be replaced. The desiccant beads in the metal bowl turn from blue to pink, indicating the need for replacement
【Rugged Construction】The air regulator and water separator are made of aluminum valve body, which is high strength, sturdy and resilient to ensure longevity in harsh industrial environments
【Complete Package】Everything needed for immediate operation is provided, including pressure gauges, air connectors, fittings, replacement filter elements, desiccant beads and thread sealing tape

product_description: ADJUSTABLE FROM 7 PSI TO 215 PSI, 140 SCFM FLOW RATE A pressure regulator's primary function is to match the flow of gas through the regulator to the demand for gas placed upon it, whilst maintaining a constant output pressure. If the load flow decreases, then the regulator flow must decrease also. If the load flow increases, then the regulator flow must increase in order to keep the controlled pressure from decreasing due to a shortage of gas in the pressure system. High pressure gas from the supply enters into the regulator through the inlet valve. The gas then enters the body of the regulator, which is controlled by the needle valve. The pressure rises, which pushes the diaphragm, closing the inlet valve to which it is attached, and preventing any more gas from entering the regulator. The outlet side is fitted with a pressure gauge. As gas is drawn from the outlet side, the pressure inside the regulator body falls. The diaphragm is pushed back by the spring and the valve opens, letting more gas in from the supply until equilibrium is reached between the outlet pressure and the spring. The outlet pressure therefore depends on the spring force, which can be adjusted by means of an adjustment knob.

COMPRESSED AIR DRYERS REDUCE THE QUANTITY OF WATER VAPOR, LIQUID WATER, HYDROCARBON, AND HYDROCARBON VAPOR IN COMPRESSED AIR. MOISTURE IN COMPRESSED AIR IS HARMFUL. WATER DAMAGES A COMPRESSED AIR SYSTEM SEVERAL WAYS. THE RESULT IS LOWER PRODUCTIVITY, INCREASED MAINTENANCE, AND HIGHER OPERATING COSTS. YOU CAN MINIMIZE THE DAMAGE WET COMPRESSED AIR CAN INFLICT ON YOUR SYSTEM BY DRYING IT.

name: 1/2" NPT Industrial Grade 3 Stage Air Dryer for Compressor, Auto Drain Air Compressor Water Separator System Filter Oil for Plasma Cutter and Paint Spray,0-240 PSI
short_description: 【Industrial Performance】The air compressor dryer features two robust 1/2" NPT air ports and a 1/4" NPT gauge port, handling high-pressure environments (up to 240 PSI) for various industrial applications. (Do not install horizontally)
【First-Stage Filter Regulator】 The adjustment knob regulates air pressure within a range of 0-240 psi; press the knob to lock. (5 Micron Filter) Removes 95% of particles and moisture.
【Second-Stage Coalescing Filter】 (0.01 Micron Coalescing Filter) Removes 99.98% of residual moisture and impurities. The red indicator light on top illuminates when replacement is required.

【Third-Stage Drying System】 Drying beads inside the metal bowl thoroughly remove and dry moisture and impurities from the air. The drying beads inside the metal bowl changing color from blue to pink indicates replacement is required.

【Complete Package】 Arrives with everything you need for immediate operation, including a pressure gauge, air connectors, pipe fittings, replacement filter elements, desiccant beads, and thread seal tape.【Note】：To prevent air leakage: When installing screws, wrap sealing tape around the threads.

【Ours】Rest assured with our commitment to quality! This product comes backed by a 36-month return. Should you need assistance, our dedicated support team is available to help with installation guidance or technical inquiries.

【Note】 The fasteners and pressure gauges at each stage must be securely tightened to avoid water leakage. If excessive moisture exists in the lines before installation, first remove the water or repeatedly replace the drying beads to eliminate it.

name: WeiTeng 1" NPT Compressed Air Filter Regulator Combo, 5 Micron Brass Filter, Semi-Auto Drain, Polycarbonate Bowl ，0-150 PSI Gauge,for Industrial Pneumatic Air Compressors
short_description: 【Product Brief】:The air compressor filter dryer regulator with lubricator is an efficient industrial equipment with the function of precisely filtering out fine dust and moisture. It also supports precise adjustment of air pressure to meet various working requirements.

​【Flow Rate & Filtration】: This product is rated at a flow rate of 5500 L/min, with an astonishing filtration accuracy of 25 µm. It ensures high cleanliness of the output air and is equipped with a precise pressure gauge that displays the working status in real time.

​【Standard Thread&Ports】: Both the air oiler filter and the pressure regulating components adopt standard 1-inch NPT interfaces, while the pressure gauge has a 1/4-inch NPT interface. The matching pipelines are also of 1-inch NPT specification, facilitating flexible combination.

【Conditions Of Use】: This product is suitable for all kinds of climatic conditions. It can withstand a maximum pressure of 145 psf and maintain a working pressure of ≥ 215 psf. It can operate stably within the temperature range of 41 - 140℉.

【Combo Unit】: This air oiler filter Features a 5 Micron Brass Filter Element which can remove dust and impurities in the air to protect the equipment and extend its lifespan; the internal valves can precisely control the gas flow rate, reducing energy consumption and enhancing work efficiency.
